info.name: OcUK Forum - White & Blue (xenforo)
info.description:
White & blue style for Overclockers UK xenforo powered forums
Black text on white background
(This is now my main style - mortals)
info.additionalInfo:
Features:

* no base64 images
* Overclockers UK logo
* default read/unread icons
* bigger vibrant buttons for specific actions
* alternating backgrounds on viewing forums
* fixes to redactor editor styling
* square avatars
* new blue site notices
* quickpost restyled & centered
* easier to read content (black text on white background)
* clean page navigation
* new codeblock
* bright thread alerts (eg: locked thread)




---

Some tweaks provided by OcUK community, thanks goes to all the people involved in the tweaks. (RoyMi6, Scottland, I'm fairly sure the answer is no, wiiija)
